doc:doc.doc:summary: An interface representing named collections of photos (eg. albums), videos (eg. channels) or both (eg. Flickr sets).

doc:description.doc:para: Retrieve a list of photo/video collections the user has on the service.

doc:doc.doc:summary: A list of Collection_Details representing remote collections on the service.

tp:member.name: Collection_Id
tp:member.doc:doc: A service-specific identifier for the collection.

tp:member.name: Collection_Name
tp:member.doc:doc: The human readable name of the collection.

tp:member.name: Supported_Media_Types
tp:member.doc:doc: Supported types of media in this collection.

tp:member.name: Item_Count
tp:member.doc:doc: The number of items currently in the collection, or -1 if unknown.
